desc:
Our client wants us to move the users (with search history) currently registered under the Pietermaritzburg branch of Geyser Du Toit Louw & Kitching Pinetown Inc (GEY004) to a new firm:  Venns Attorneys.

The move must not affect billing or break it as per Sameer, Yasser please confirm if the change will be made now or beginning of next month. 

Once we have received the go-ahead, I will create the new firm in SearchWorks, in order for Dev to make the necessary changes.
name: CC - Move Users
